Key Match Events: A.J. Puk's 9th inning meltdown, allowing 3 home runs, including a two-run blast by Kyle Higashioka and a two-run homer to Donovan Solano
Pre-Game Insights: The D-backs had to win to keep their hopes of clinching a playoff spot on Sunday alive
Post-Match Reflections: Walker said 'Gotta tip your hat,' and 'It's frustrating to say but there's two sides of it. Somebody else is doing their job when they're getting you out.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres stunned the Arizona Diamondbacks with five runs in the top of the 9th inning, and the D-backs mustered just two hits
Euduardo Rodriguez pitched 4.2 solid shutout innings, giving up just four hits and two walks while striking out three
Others: Brandon Pfaadt will get the ball in game 162 for the D-backs, and the game will start at 12:10 p.m.
